title: Lost Promotional series to gold V
body: There are so many trolls in the promotional to gold V. Season's ending soon, I'm looking forward to be victorious but dumb players keep coming into my game and feeding lanes. It's so BS. I'm on 1-2 right now so I HAVE to win my next 2. Please how do I do this. How many tries did it take u to reach gold V?

replies.body: atleast you're able to get that far i practically gave up halfway on the promotional to Bronze V (Begin all the #noob or #gitgud comments now) only because my teams are utter garbage in they have no clue how the enemies champion is played and just assume almost all champions are squishy as hell like most adc's only to then complain and accuse the opponent of hacking when all the opponent did was build tank. I admit i may not be the best player in the world but i atleast know how to lane and survive (if my teammates don't screw me over by feeding my opponent) out of the 7 ranked games i've played i've won 1 which is kinda sad i know but its because people are being childish and feeding if so much as take 1 cs from their lane (its happened - mid was dead top was afk so i went to hold mid, my mid complains and whines that i killed a single minion and almost killed the enemy midlaner that he went and purposely died to the enemy top laner so much that we eventually ended up losing because the enemy team had a fed Pantheon running around Shreking everyone.
Learn the game. You're bronze 5 so you have nothing to lose and everything to gain!
Im lower then bronze 5 since i haven't finished the 10 ranked games you have to play (been a little lazy)
Bronze is easy to carry out of. But silver/gold's different. We know how to play and snowball hard. So some games in high silver/gold are practically impossible to carry.
I don't disagree with you there i just find it frustrating that half the people i meet in ranked are either trolls or people who think they're invincible at the champion they play

Many lower elo (no offense) players don't see the point of the word 'carrying'. It doesn't mean going 20/0 at 20 minutes though it could be. But even landing let say an Ahri charm on their enemy carry and deleting him/her before the team fight can also be carrying. You may not be 17/0 but believe me little plays like that can more than often win you the game.

Man I feel you.
I recent;y did my gold games and man were they fucked.

the first two games were so much harder then what it needed to be.
The third we got fuckgin stomped and 20 min win for the last one.

I believe in you, just be calm as you can be XD
If you fail, you can do it again.

When you have time, dont do it now.
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLyCEt27AsZusDqA5hp8hnF480-30FXRAi

But those were my god forsaken games.

You can do it!
FOR SHURIMA
Usually takes me about 3 attempts from silver 1 to gold V =)

It took me around 10 promo series to get to gold last season. during the first attempt I only played jungle, but by the time I got to gold I had gotten competent at 3 other roles. 

Just stay positive and don't waste energy worrying about the rest of your team, you can /mute all if you know you are prone to destractions.

Hi plz downvote my post lel

Cat picture attached
